item.title: Innovative Solar Micro Power Plant
item.description: MICROSOL is a research & collaborative project bringing tocheter labs, industrial companies and innovative start-ups. Solar power plant are designed to produce heat, electricity and optionally pure water for off-grid infrastructures.
